SS transformed and shot his boa at Quickstrike's snake
attempting to tie it to a nearby tree and make
Quickstrike an easy target.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> The sword damaged Waspinator's metal then Waspinator
> flew backwards 
> while firing energy blasts as Talon
> 
> Quickstrike was knocked back into the base walls by
> the blast "That 
> guys tougher then he looks" he said to himself and
> begun charging a 
> venom blast in his snake mouth.
> 
> Inferno was caught by the tendrils "Your tricks will
> not help you 
> against the power of the royalty" he grunted out and
> fired his 
> flamethrower on the tendrils trying to burn it off. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Inside the base, Warhead tried to catch something
> and rise. His 
> > motricity was still awful, but the call of the
> battle and the 
> mockery 
> > of those Tripredacus were too strong. He managed
> to stand up, but 
> > putting one leg in front of the other was
> impossible.
> > 
> > Warhead: If I can not stand, I will transform!
> > 
> > He went into his hovercraft mode, which was much
> more mobile. He 
> made 
> > it out of the base and, seeing Spike, fired at him
> with machine 
> guns.
> > 
> > Tyrael saw Spike too and greeted him.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Whoever you are, you are welcome with us
> Tripredacus. Now 
> > fight with us!
> > 
> > As he said these words, he received fully
> Quickstrike's energy 
> blast. 
> > He countered, after getting up, with two light
> blasts of his own.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Very well, Megatron. We shall have it your
> way. Know this, 
> > though: the Dragon is a tough kill, but the
> Phoenix rises after 
> dying! 
> > Now get out and fight me! Tripredacus! Attack now!
> > 
> > Burrock, on his side, avoided the rocket shot by
> Inferno, but not 
> by 
> > much. He got fried a bit from the blast, but was
> otherwise alright.
> > 
> > Burrock: This sure beats those other absent
> clowns! NOW WHO'S THE 
> > SMART METAL ASS WHO FIRED ON ME? YOU THE ONE?
> > 
> > He turned to Inferno and tried to grab him with
> his tendrils and 
> crush 
> > him.
> 
>
